name: Football Soccer League Match
description:
Do you have love for football? Yes, we got you! We have the best soccer championship game for you! Join the football soccer league and be the champion of the world football championship. Make a team, start to kick ball in the soccer match stadium. Challenge the world and win the championship.

Enter into the football stadium for the soccer league championship and start the match with other 3 continents. Get the points and upgrade the kick ball soccer stadium. Select your favorite player who can make a football goal with the soccer ball.

The soccer ball tournament has been started. Get ready for the championship and win the football match. Upgrade the uniform kits and player for more furious tournaments. Smash the soccer ball and goal it! This is a full action-packed game that brings the world’s best players into the electronic ball soccer match.

Clash with competitors on the soccer league simulator. You are required to make some epic and perfect goals. Be fast and earn points to upgrade the football stadium. Have fun! There are different amazing electronic balls in this game that will force you to play the football tournament again and again.

Keep on playing the best football and be the best player by making the goal. See the match summary and check the results. Choose your best player and start the tournament with other competitors.

• Upgradable player, uniform kit, football stadium
• Best soccer league tournament simulator
• Engaging gameplay controls
• Overall match summary
• 3D HD football stadium environment
